name: Long pointed sabatons
data: It increases the users strength adequately.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It has awesome armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration somewhat.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
It increases the users physical resistance a bit.
It increases the users magical resistance a bit.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
It increases the users fire resistance a bit.
It increases the users cold resistance a bit.
